Positive_Review: Absolutely fabulous For Paris standards this is above 4 hotel Rooms are big Bathrooms are fabulous Location amazing Thanks a lot I am coming back

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: That we couldn t stay longer
Positive_Review: This was an awesome hotel in a great location Staff went beyond the ordinary to help us and were great They very kindly held onto a bike we were travelling with whilst we were out of Paris for a few days before we returned again Thanks so much

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Great speed of service with likeable staff that dos everything to make the stay comfortable Small caramels before sleeping left on the bed Not what you expect from a 4 hotel Clarins bath products also a nice surprise Bathrobe and slippers too Not what you expect for a 4 hotel so well done For the price it really is good value for money in a central location in Paris just off Place Vendome Amazing Breakfast was also sufficient with juices fruit hot etc A decent spread

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Location was quite central for touring Paris by foot and by subway Hotel staff was very helpful in giving subway restaurant and event info Rooms include everything you might need

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Loved this hotel Spotless comfortable friendly staff Clarins products in bathroom Extremely comfortable bed and pillows Perfect location Breakfast to our rooms for 2 mornings and ate in gorgeous breakfast room last morning A great hotel highly recommend

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Two items from the minibar were very expensive
Positive_Review: A very comfortable hotel in a very nice area We arrived very early morning the lady at the front desk made a call and arranged to check us in at 10 30 By the time we came back from a cafe nearby our luggage was already in the room The other front desk staff were friendly as were the dining room staff Overall it was a pleasant experience

Hotel_Name: Hotel Stendhal Place Vend me Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Very comfortable small hotel in an excellent location just off the place vendome with friendly staff and delicious breakfast I ve stayed at the Stendhal a couple of times and would highly recommend it to others
